import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { NavLink, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './AdminDashboardLayout.css'; // This line is very important const AdminDashboardLayout = ({ children }) => { const [user, setUser] = useState(null); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { const userData = localStorage.getItem('user'); if (userData) { setUser(JSON.parse(userData)); } }, []); const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('token'); localStorage.removeItem('user'); navigate('/login'); }; return (
